Title: Requires vehicles operated by public transit authorities to contain opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires vehicles operated by public transit authorities to contain opioid antagonists and for public transit authorities to train employees on the proper use of opioid antagonists.
LawCode: Amd ยง3309, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring vehicles operated by public transit authorities to contain opioid antagonists
